Package com.coherentsolutions.yaf.web.utils.component

Class WebComponentBuilder<C extends WebComponent<T>,T extends org.openqa.selenium.WebElement>

java.lang.Object
com.coherentsolutions.yaf.web.utils.component.WebComponentBuilder<C,T>
Type Parameters:
C - the type of the web component
T - the type of the web element
public class WebComponentBuilder<C extends WebComponent<T>,T extends org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> extends Object
Builder class for creating and configuring instances of WebComponent.

This builder class provides methods to set various properties and annotations for a web component, and then build the component instance.
